website_summaries.verdict: This magnetic screwdriver is easy to grip and has a long enough reach to chase the pesky screw that's trying to get away.
pros: Non-slip, molded grips give easier hand control
cons: Might need to be re-magnetized from time to time

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Love the magnet
customer_reviews.text: The magnet came in clutch. Dropped a few screws behind the motherboard when I was installing it's and it and got them out easy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Packaging-Almost Impossible to Remove
customer_reviews.text: Screw driver may be great, but after trying to remove the packaging I won't be able to use mt left hand for a while since I sliced it open trying to remove the packaging with a knife. Hint, don't use a knife to remove packaging, use a large, strong pair of wire cutters or strong pliers with a cutting edge. There is a better way to package this product and the manufacturer needs to find it an use it. Total bs that it is so difficult to remove. Ya, I'm a little angry.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you are building your own PC!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you the number of times I went "thank god for the magnet" while building mine. It might not seem like anything important on paper, but as soon as you start screwing in hard to reach spots you really come to appreciate the importance of the magnet at the tip of the screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Naivety

customer_reviews.title: A must for cabinet hinges
customer_reviews.text: I painted the kitchen cabinets during our 'social distancing' and putting the doors up with the new hinges was causing so many issues until we got this screwdriver to hold the screws in place. It is not easy to rehang a door when the battery operated drill can't fit into the area between a cabinet and the wall, for instance, but with this we started the screws and could get them into position and then tighten with the power drill. I love it and just wish we bought it at the beginning of the project.
customer_reviews.author: love2read

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I find I misplace my hand tools often and none more than my screwdrivers! The price is right, the magnetic tip works. I have no complaints, I added 2 of these to my shop and it works as a screwdriver should work - if your looking for an extra screwdriver for your tool box or to have one in your junk drawer, this is the one. Perhaps not the best choice for a professional as it's not as comfortable as one 3×s the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality and price screw driver. Gets the job done! Wish I had ordered a shorter length bc I was trying to screw on drawer knobs on already assembled drawers, which were not very deep and had to screw them in at an angle, which was difficult. But probably should measured them before hand. Anyway, the magnet in the head is nice but not very strong that it makes that much of a difference. And the coloring of the top comes or quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: The handle, magnetic tip, price, quality. They all make this a top notch screwdriver. It is better than any i have ever felt. The amount of grip on the handle makes everything easier. The only slight annoyance is that sometimes the handle hurts after turning it for a long time because it is pure rubber. Pretty painful
customer_reviews.author: Poizoni

customer_reviews.title: While it does work the magnet is very weak
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the $5 or $6 I spent, I guess you get what you pay for but it's just a phillips screwdriver. At that it couldn't do what I bought it for, which is assist with the magnet. Def beware and purchase from a reputable tool company. Not worth the hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: UNiiKsTyLes

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. They look good but they also perform well. Multiple lengths allow you to have use these for various applications. The tools appear durable as well. Good value, I couldn’t find a better deal at any store.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Family

customer_reviews.title: I love the magnated Screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: We were putting a stand on back of our tv set and all of all screwdriver wouldn't hold properly. So we bought this screwdriver and we decided to buy a phillips and slotted.
customer_reviews.author: Pgenter

customer_reviews.title: A good tool for basic use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they have a magnetic tip, which isn't very magnetic. I won't return them, because they are still good for basic work projects, but have already purchased different tools with magnetic tips that work much better.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice long Philips head screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: Its a screwdriver..... great for when I build PCs as its longer tool. Works as advertised and feels like a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick T

customer_reviews.title: Good screwdriver for pc building
customer_reviews.text: This screwdriver made my pc building experience a lot easier and more pleasant. The magnetic tip held on to the screws so that they wouldn't constantly fall or move when you were trying to screw them into the case. If you are thinking about building a pc, I highly recommend getting this screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for a magnetized tip.
customer_reviews.text: So aggravated I spent money on this specifically for a magnetized tip— having a full toolkit at home, I only needed a magnetized tip to help building a small form factor pc. The magnet on the tip was super weak and would barely hold a screw if I tried hard enough, but the weight of the screwdriver itself plus the downward force of me trying to get into the pc case rendered the magnets useless, as it would not hold the screw going down.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice in hand
customer_reviews.text: Works for my projects. Feels nice in my hand. Only thing is it appears the tip of the screwdriver is developing a very slight bend. Need to investigate further. Still working as it should though.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Galvan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT NUMBER 2 PHILLIPS
customer_reviews.text: This is the size you need for most Phillips head screw application like dry wall screws and sheet metal screws for instance. This is made very well and is very durable. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony NYCTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like the magnetic on the end the keeps the screws attached to the screwdriver. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The long handle was cheaper, so I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This screwdriver works. I think I'd have liked a shorter handle, but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: ConsiderThis

customer_reviews.title: Good screwdriver, bad magnetic tip.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this screwdriver for the magnetic tip for PC building as it is much easier. I read many of the reviews and it was shown that the magnetic tip was strong however I was disappointed to find out that mine was very weak. It could not pick up or move any screws. The screwdriver itself is good quality but the magnetic tip is a coinflip.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L.

customer_reviews.title: Not magnetic!
customer_reviews.text: This IS NOT a magnetic screwdriver regardless of the picture. Ok as a reqular screwdriver but handle is a bit awkward
customer_reviews.author: Campingtramp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pc building
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and it just feels extremely comfortable in the hand.Plus the magnetic tip and price cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amuro

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool is perfect for assembling items which uses small screws. Game changer!
customer_reviews.author: V Rich

customer_reviews.title: I love this screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable, perfect philips screwdriver, and one of my favorites. two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hurt

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic tip and long shaft save time and effort.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the magnetic tip and relatively long shaft and it has been a godsend. I use it for building computers but it makes any job that requires a tight fit with no way to hold a screw in proper position simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Novak

customer_reviews.title: PC Build + This = Time Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This six inch screwdriver is the perfect size for me to build & work on client's computers. The magnetic tip is strong enough to hold computer screws & was a lifesaver in tight areas where holding tiny screws proved difficult. It's just a screwdriver, but having the magnetic tip truly saves time & aggravation. I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Good screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: This one has a wider handle than my old favorite, so it won't take as much muscle power to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: particularly use it for my tower fan since the screws are not easily accessible.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and does what it is supposed to do, particularly use it for my tower fan since the screws are not easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Trajon

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a screwdriver with a magnetic tip, long shaft, and ergonomic grip. This has it. I'm building my first PC and needed something like this. Especially for the price, this is a good buy
customer_reviews.author: LeahTaylor

customer_reviews.title: great magnetic tip screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to assemble my new gaming pc. it has a strong magnetic tip and is the perfect length for pc assembly. made my build a real pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Fonzie B.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Used and Dull
customer_reviews.text: Looked very used when it arrived, like someone had smashed the tip of it. The tip was very dull. We can’t use it on any screws, totally worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie E. Eytchison

customer_reviews.title: It's a screwdrvier!
customer_reviews.text: It's a screwdriver, what else is there to say. I bought this for the longer shaft to work on my pool cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great for PC builds
customer_reviews.text: I like the balance and feel of the tool. #2 x 6" is perfect for building desktop PCs.
customer_reviews.author: R Saulnier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect magnetic screwdriver for desktop PC building, and other applications
customer_reviews.text: Zero complaints, great product. I used this for building a desktop PC, and it was a perfect size for that. The magnetic tip is a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: Blaise Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Good. Cheap. Magnetic tip is strong.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to build my first PC. Very good and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Jake B

customer_reviews.title: it's a screwdriver and it drove screws - this is good because I would have been flabbergasted if it didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Yep, it's a screwdriver and it drove screws - this is good because I would have been flabbergasted if it didn't work...
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Egan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Simple screwdriver, good length, magnetic tip. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Tylerrrr

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 before and thought it was a decent screwdriver over all . but the second one I purchased months later was a defective piece of garbage. First use. Rounded off the tip
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: NOT Magnetic
customer_reviews.text: The tip of this screwdriver is NOT magnetic. It was advertised being magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy buckley

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is really well made and stylish tool. It was shipped fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hooks

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: I like the handle. It doesn’t roll or move if you lay it in an inclined surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not magnetic
customer_reviews.text: The screwdriver I received looked exactly as pictured but the tip was not magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: 1st Pc build
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my first pc build. I would recommend it, to anyone who needs one.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek. Perfect long neck. Overall awesome. I’ll be using this screwdriver for the next 100 years
customer_reviews.author: Tomasandrew_s

customer_reviews.title: Not a Magnetic tip
customer_reviews.text: Not magnetic at all. I was building my first computer and was really frustrated when the tip was not magnetic, it would have really helped
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic. Useful.
customer_reviews.text: Magnetic. Works for its purpose. Bought it to build a PC.
customer_reviews.author: anna-banana

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic tip works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a new PC build. Worked as I expected. Didn't drop any screws I was working with.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST USEFUL BUY FOR A PC BUILD
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for building any PC if your new to building get one anyone whose built a gaming PC has one of these
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Phillips head
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this screwdriver specifically for my PC build. Long shaft and magnetic head. 'nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Magnetism is weak
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product for the cost but the magnetism is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Steger

customer_reviews.title: Not even Magnetic!
customer_reviews.text: The tip isn’t even magnetic. 100% false advertising, don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Comes in handy in PC building, especially when dealing with tiny screws.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Good for building PC's
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable grip. Magnetic tip was nice for not losing screws putting my pc together.
customer_reviews.author: Heston

customer_reviews.title: Will not stand up to moderate use
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality tip It’s wore out after only being used to tighten a dozen wood screws.
customer_reviews.author: Casey B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: What can I say its a screwdriver, has a magnetic tip; wonderful so you dont drop those important screws all the time. I like the triangular design on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Yair Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: It's a screwdriver how good can it be
customer_reviews.text: No this thing is sturdy, exactly as described, and has a nice magnetic tip. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbie

customer_reviews.title: No Magnetic Tip
customer_reviews.text: The one I ordered did not have a magnetic tip like I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sogar

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for computer assembly
customer_reviews.text: Worked excellently for the small screws in hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: Jared K.

customer_reviews.title: This tool is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use this when building my gaming PC highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Delante

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a magnetic tip screwdriver. It works. Helped me build my PC. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Garry Cen

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved it for his PC build!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought this to use for building his PC and he loved it! He plans to use it on the rest of his future builds!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Not Magnetic
customer_reviews.text: Although it advertised itself as having a magnetic tip, it certainly did not. It wouldn't pick up the screws to attach my motherboard to the case, nor any other screws for that matter. It is a fine quality screwdriver, but the entire purpose I got it was because it was "magnetic". Bull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hard to reach places
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the hard to reach places. I used it to take apart a table with hard to reach screws.
customer_reviews.author: Samara

product_meta.title: Performance Tool W30964 Black & Red Phillips Screwdriver, #2 x 6"
product_meta.description: Size:Phillips Screwdriver, #2 x 6"#2 x 6" Phillips Screwdriver forged from chrome vanadium steel with corrosion resistant satin finish.
feature_bullets: Ergonomic non slip molded grips for improved comfort and control.
Chrome vanadium steel with corrosion resistant satin finish and magnetic tips.
